executionArgs.additionalInstruction: Login credentials: admin@sistema.local / password. Frontend runs on port 3000. After login, the system may show a tenant selection screen - select "Calibrações Brasil". The system uses Portuguese (Brazilian) language for UI elements. Wait for page loads as it's a SPA with lazy loading. For delete operations, there will be a confirmation modal dialog. Use longer timeouts (30s) for page transitions.
